projects.name: GPT Assistant
projects.blurb: AI-powered assistant that integrates OpenAI's GPT with a serverless AWS backend. Features include natural language chat, calendar event extraction, and image uploads to S3 — all wrapped in a modern, mobile-friendly React UI.
projects.impact: Provides a foundation for building lightweight AI agents and productivity tools. Demonstrates end-to-end integration of GPT with AWS services using a clean UI and scalable infrastructure.

projects.name: Finance Tracker
projects.blurb: Parses PDF bank statements and automatically groups recurring payments such as rent or wages, integrating with AWS Lambda for serverless automation.
projects.impact: Reduced monthly reconciliation time from hours to minutes; identifies DD/SO patterns automatically.

projects.name: Personal Tracker App (evolving into Mind Mirror)
projects.blurb: Early-stage wellness and productivity tracker built with a serverless AWS backend. Users can log daily goals, scores, and personal notes through a web interface. Currently transitioning into 'Mind Mirror' — a deeper system for mood tracking, reflection, and guided self-awareness.
projects.impact: Automates weekly summaries and progress tracking; future versions aim to integrate GPT-powered reflections and personalized feedback.

projects.name: Job Scraper (Docker) — evolving into Email Job Search Agent
projects.blurb: Initial version is a Dockerized Python scraper that collects AWS/Python job listings from public websites. Now evolving into a smarter agent that parses email alerts (e.g., LinkedIn job search emails) to extract relevant roles and log opportunities automatically.
projects.impact: Reduces manual job hunting effort by automating both scraping and email parsing, with future plans for GPT-based role summarization and prioritization.
